name: Tokyu Stay Shimbashi
description: Renovated in 2014, Tokyu Stay Shimbashi - Ginza area offers modern accommodations with free WiFi, a microwave and a refrigerator. The hotel is just a 3-minute walk from JR Shimbashi Train Station and Shimbashi Subway Station. Air conditioned rooms are fitted with a flat-screen TV, high speed LAN internet/WiFi and an en suite bathroom with a hairdryer and a bath. Each room is equipped with a washer and dryer, as well as a safety deposit box. Shimbashi Tokyu Stay has vending machines, an ironing service and a dry cleaning service. It also offers a 24-hour front desk and a luggage storage service. A buffet-style breakfast is available at the restaurant. The popular upscale shopping area of Ginza is within a 10-minute walk away, while Tokyo Station is a quick 9-minute walk and train ride away. The Tsukiji Market is a 5-minute taxi ride from the hotel.

name: Mimaru Tokyo Asakusa Station
description: No description found

name: Toyoko Inn Tokyo Nihombashi Mitsukoshi Mae A4
description: Attractively situated in the Chuo Ward district of Tokyo, Toyoko Inn Tokyo Nihombashi Mitsukoshi Mae A4 is situated 100 metres from Horidome Children's Park, 500 metres from Koamicho Children's Park and 200 metres from Suginomori Shrine. Featuring a shared lounge, the 3-star hotel has air-conditioned rooms with free WiFi, each with a private bathroom. The property is close to popular attractions like Genyadana Monument, Daiichi Sankyo Kusuri Museum and Fukutoku Shrine. At the hotel, rooms include a desk. The rooms in Toyoko Inn Tokyo Nihombashi Mitsukoshi Mae A4 are fitted with a flat-screen TV and free toiletries. Guests at the accommodation can enjoy a buffet breakfast. Popular points of interest near Toyoko Inn Tokyo Nihombashi Mitsukoshi Mae A4 include Sankatsu Yukata Museum, Takarada Ebisu Shrine and Ozu History Museum. The nearest airport is Tokyo Haneda Airport, 19 km from the hotel.

name: Grand Hyatt Tokyo
description: Grand Hyatt Tokyo is an award-winning luxury hotel centrally located in Roppongi Hills, a multi-use complex housing shops, restaurants, a cinema, art museum and observatory. Roppongi Station is just a 3-minute walk away. Free WiFi is available in all rooms and guests also have access to the business centre on site. The stylish and modern rooms incorporate warm wood furnishings and Japanese aesthetics into the design. All rooms feature a private bathroom with a rain shower and deep soaking limestone bathtub that allows guests to relax after a long day. In addition, the room is equipped with a flat-screen TV, DVD player, safety deposit box, laptop charger, minibar and Japanese yukata robes. Complimentary mineral water bottles are provided. A range of services are available at the concierge desk and currency exchange is provided at the 24-hour front desk. Guests can enjoy spa treatments and massages at the Nagomi Spa and Fitness Center or relax by the indoor swimming pool that utilises natural stone designs. Grand Hyatt Tokyo offers 10 restaurants and bars that feature a variety of international cuisine including French, Italian, Chinese, steak meals, Japanese sushi, teppanyaki and seasonal kaiseki cuisine. Guests can enjoy dining at one of the open-air terraces or listen to live music in the jazz lounge Maduro. Tokyo Grand Hyatt is a 40-minute bus ride from Haneda Airport and a 90-minute ride from Narita Airport on the limousine bus (charges apply). Tokyo Station is a 25-minute train ride away.

name: Hotel Mystays Kiyosumi Shirakawa
description: Just 10 minutes' walk from Kiyosumi-shirakawa Metro Station, Flexstay Inn Kiyosumi-Shirakawa has an accessible setting, making it an ideal base when visiting Tokyo. It also provides laundry facilities, a lift and a laundry service. The hotel has 55 rooms offering all the necessities to ensure an enjoyable stay. Flexstay Inn Kiyosumi-Shirakawa is close to Morishita Railway Station, making it easy for guests to discover Tokyo and its surrounding areas. Ueno Park, Tokyo Tower and Tokyo Skytree Tower are within a short drive from the hotel.Revato

name: Tokyu Stay Shinjuku
description: Opened in May 2015, Tokyu Stay Shinjuku is ideally located in the middle of the lively Shinjuku area and just steps away from Shinjuku Sanchome Subway Station. JR Shinjuku Station is also an 8-minute walk away. Free WiFi is available throughout the property. Guests will also find a 24-hour front desk with free luggage storage services at Shinjuku Tokyu Stay. Fitted with white and light-wood furnishings, all rooms come with a flat-screen TV, fridge and electric kettle. Certain rooms feature a microwave for guest's convenience. An air purifier/humidifier is also provided in each room. The private bathrooms feature a shower, while certain bathrooms are additionally equipped with a bath. Extras include a hairdryer and free toiletries. Some rooms includes a washing machine and a tumble dryer. The hotel offers free rental services including trouser press, smartphone charger and DVD player. There are a number of restaurants and bars in the surrounding area, as well as Isetan Department Store and movie theatres. Shinjuku Gyoen Park is a 3-minute walk away, while Tokyo Metropolitan Government Building can be reached within a 20-minute walk.

name: Hotel Mystays Kamata
description: Located just a five-minute stroll from Kamata Train Station, Hotel Mystays Kamata offers guests an ideal base while visiting Tokyo. It also offers free wireless internet. The hotel features a spa, offering a wide range of relaxing treatments and beauty therapy. For added convenience, it provides luggage storage, a 24-hour reception and a safe. Rooms are air-conditioned and feature top-of-the-range amenities such as a rain shower, slippers and an oversized bathtub. They are all soundproofed and include a flat-screen TV, a private bathroom and a seating area. The area surrounding Hotel Mystays Kamata has a variety of cafés and restaurants. It is within a 20-minute stroll of Keikyu Kamata Railway Station, which allows for easy access in and around Tokyo.Revato

name: The Kitano Hotel Tokyo
description: The Kitano Hotel Tokyo is just steps away from the Nagatacho subway station Exit 4. The hotel offers complimentary WiFi, 24-hour front desk, luggage storage. Featuring an onsite beauty salon and acupuncture therapy. Japanese traditional tea can also be arranged at the tea salon, while the rooftop lounge offers view of the Imperial Palace and city. All air-conditioned rooms are individually decorated with neutral, natural features and artworks. Equipped with a seating area with a flat-screen TV, electric kettle and fridge, all rooms have either a kitchenette or a fully-equipped kitchen. En suite bathrooms offer a bidet toilet, hairdryer, toothbrushes and free toiletries. Carefully selected weight-optimising mattress is fitted in all rooms. The Kitano Hotel Tokyo offers a bar and 2 restaurants on site. Visit Sushi Oumi, featuring Edo-style sushi. The Imperial Palace moat is a 13-minute walk away, while the National Diet Building and Hie Shrine is a 10-minute walk away. Shibuya Station is 9-minutes and Ginza Station is 14-minute away by metro lines.

name: B:Conte Asakusa
description: Only a 5-minute walk from Asakusa Subway Station and Tawaramachi Subway Station, B:CONTE Asakusa offers modern accommodations with a kitchen and an in-room launderette. Free Wi-Fi is available at the entire property and Japanese/English-speaking concierge service is available. Senso-ji Temple is a 3-minute walk away. This air-conditioned room features a flat-screen UHDTV and ironing facilities. The kitchen comes with a microwave, a fridge and a stove. Kitchenware is provided as well. French and Italian dishes are served at Daimasu Bar. Asakusa B:CONTE is a 10-minute train ride from Tokyo Sky Tree and Ryogoku Sumo Hall. JR Ueno and Akihabara Train Stations are both a 5-minute train ride away.

name: Tokyu Stay Suidobashi
description: Only a 4-minute walk from JR Suidobashi Station, Tokyu Stay offers free Wi-Fi at the entire property. Some rooms are equipped for a long-term stay, featuring a kitchenette and a washing machine. The lobby has free-use internet PCs. The Suidobashi Tokyu Stay is a 10-minute walk from Tokyo Dome. JR Suidobashi Station connects to Akihabara in 5 minutes and to Shinjuku in 15 minutes. Tokyo Station is a 10-minute train ride. All air-conditioned rooms at Tokyu Stay Suidobashi are fitted with a an LCD TV with satellite channels, a safety deposit box and a small fridge. A hairdryer and toiletries are provided in the en suite bathroom. Tokyu Stay offers a 24-hour reception that provides free luggage storage. Charged services include dry cleaning and arrangement of courier deliveries. A breakfast buffet with a spread of Japanese and Western dishes is served at the dining room, from 07:00 until 09:30.

name: Toyoko Inn Tokyo Station Shin Ohashi Mae
description: Ideally located in the prime touristic area of Tokyo Station, Toyoko Inn Tokyo-eki Shin-Ohashi Mae promises a relaxing and wonderful visit. The property features a wide range of facilities to make your stay a pleasant experience. Free Wi-Fi in all rooms, laundromat, 24-hour front desk, Wi-Fi in public areas, car park are on the list of things guests can enjoy. Designed for comfort, selected guestrooms offer television LCD/plasma screen, internet access – wireless, internet access – wireless (complimentary), non smoking rooms, air conditioning to ensure a restful night. The hotel offers various recreational opportunities. Convenience and comfort makes Toyoko Inn Tokyo-eki Shin-Ohashi Mae the perfect choice for your stay in Tokyo.Agoda

name: Koko Hotel Residence Asakusa Kappabashi
description: Ideally located in the Taito district of Tokyo, KOKO HOTEL Residence Asakusa Kappabashi is set 200 metres from Kinryu Park, 400 metres from Sogenji Temple and 400 metres from Akiba Shrine. With free WiFi, this 4-star hotel offers a 24-hour front desk and luggage storage space. The property is 6.8 km from the city centre and 300 metres from Kappabashi-dori Shopping Street. All guest rooms come with air conditioning, a fridge, a microwave, a kettle, a shower, free toiletries and a desk. At the hotel all rooms include a private bathroom with a bath. Popular points of interest near KOKO HOTEL Residence Asakusa Kappabashi include Asakusa ROX Shopping Center, Matsuba Park and Drum Museum. The nearest airport is Tokyo Haneda Airport, 23 km from the accommodation.

name: Koko Hotel Residence Asakusa Tawaramachi
description: Well set in the Taito district of Tokyo, KOKO HOTEL Residence Asakusa Tawaramachi is situated 500 metres from Matsuba Park, 100 metres from Eiken-ji Temple and 500 metres from Kappabashi-dori Shopping Street. This 4-star hotel offers a 24-hour front desk and luggage storage space. The property is non-smoking and is located 200 metres from Honpo-ji Temple. All units are equipped with a flat-screen TV with satellite channels, a kettle, a bidet, free toiletries and a desk. With a private bathroom equipped with a shower and a hairdryer, rooms at the hotel also provide guests with free WiFi. Popular points of interest near KOKO HOTEL Residence Asakusa Tawaramachi include Rinko-ji Temple, Drum Museum and Tokaku-ji Temple. The nearest airport is Tokyo Haneda Airport, 22 km from the accommodation.

name: Mesm Tokyo, Autograph Collection
description: Located near Ginza Tokyo’s most glamorous shopping, dining and entertainment district. 1 hour cruise departs from the pier in front of the hotel, see the magnificent azure expanse of Tokyo Bay on a relaxing cruise and down to Sumida River to Asakusa immersed in rich tradition. The name mesm comes from the word mesmerize. Feast your eyes on panoramic views of Hamarikyu Japanese Historical Garden while drinking at the Whisk on 16th Floor and the Club mesm on 25th Floor. Throughout the hotel guests encounter leading Japanese brands which emphasize the cutting edge style and trends of our downtown environs. At mesm Tokyo we enchant guests with sights and sounds, music and art. Digital 88 key piano in the designed hotel room elevates your stay.Marriott

name: Mimaru Suites Tokyo Asakusa
description: Along with multilingual staff, this aparthotel has free WiFi in public areas and a vending machine. Each apartment provides a flat-screen TV with digital channels, plus a kitchen with a refrigerator, a stovetop, and a microwave. Guests can appreciate conveniences like 2 bathrooms and an all-in-one washing machine and dryer, and other amenities include free WiFi and a separate tub and shower. Housekeeping is available on request.Expedia

name: Mimaru Tokyo Ikebukuro
description: A plethora of fashion and electronic stores alongside delicious Japanese ramen restaurants are waiting for you within walking distance. All 107 rooms feature a PC. A convenient location along the Yamanote line that lends itself well to sightseeing and/or business.Situated in the Toshima district in Tokyo, MIMARU Tokyo IKEBUKURO offers 4-star rooms with free WiFi. The property is close to several well-known attractions, 800 m from Ikebukuro Station, 700 m from Metropolitan Plaza and 800 m from Wacca Ikebukuro. The property is 500 m from Ikebukuro Marui Shopping Center, and within 500 m of the city centre.The hotel will provide guests with air-conditioned rooms offering a desk, a kettle, a fridge, a microwave, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with a bidet. At MIMARU Tokyo IKEBUKURO the rooms have bed linen and towels.Popular points of interest near the accommodation include Ikebukuro Mitake Shrine, Ikebukuro Nishi-guchi Park and Tobu Department Store Ikebukuro. The nearest airport is Tokyo Haneda Airport, 25 km from MIMARU Tokyo IKEBUKURO.Sembo

name: Centurion Hotel Residential Akasaka Station
description: Situated in the heart of Akasaka, Centurion Hotel Residential Akasaka is a 1-minute walk from Akasaka Subway Station and a 3-minute walk from Akasaka Mitsuke Subway Station, which provides access to several train lines. Free WiFi is available throughout the entire property. The air-conditioned and heated rooms feature a flat-screen TV, a Slumberland mattress, washing machine and safety deposit box. Guests can use the fridge and electric kettle in the kitchenette. The kitchen items could rent for 1000 yen per day, but just only for the rooms in main building. The en suite bathroom comes with a shower booth and a hairdryer. Nightwear is provided. Guests will find free organic amenities including shampoo, conditioner, body wash and facial cleanser at the property. The luggage storage and dry cleaning services are offered at the 24-hour front desk. A WiFi router is available for guests' convenience. Men`s Sauna facilities are situated within 5-minute walk, provide discount coupon for staying guests. The annex cabin tower offers a flat-screen TV, free WiFi access and a coin laundry service at an extra cost. A WiFi router can be borrowed. Some services differ from that of the main property building. Akasaka Centurion Residential Hotel is a 20-minute train ride from the Imperial Palace and a 5-minute walk from Hie Shrine. TBS TV Station, Akasaka Sacas and various shops are within a 5-minute walk. Tokyo Station is a 15-minute drive and Haneda Airport and Tokyo Disney Resort are a 40-minute train ride away. Narita International Airport is a 75-minute train ride away.

name: Flexstay Inn Shinagawa
description: Flexstay Inn Shinagawa provides comfortable 3-star accommodation in Tokyo. It also offers luggage storage, a ticket service and a tour desk. Flexstay Inn Shinagawa features 55 air conditioned rooms. Rooms also include flat-screen TVs and ample workspace. The hotel is under a 25-minute drive from Haneda Airport. It is within a 20-minute stroll of Tennozu Isle Station and Shinagawa Railway Station, which allows for easy access in and around Tokyo.Revato

name: Monday Apart Ueno-Shin-Okachimachi
description: MONday Apart Ueno Shinokachimachi has air-conditioned guest accommodation in the centre of Tokyo, 300 metres from The Shitaya Shrine, 400 metres from Choen-ji Temple and 600 metres from Tokaku-ji Temple. Complimentary WiFi is available and private parking is available on site. The units come with carpeted floor and feature a fully equipped kitchen with a microwave, a dining area, a flat-screen TV with streaming services, and a private bathroom with bidet and slippers. A toaster, a fridge and stovetop are also featured, as well as a kettle. Popular points of interest near the aparthotel include Ryukoku-ji Temple, Hoon-ji Temple and Rinko-ji Temple. The nearest airport is Tokyo Haneda Airport, 21 km from MONday Apart Ueno Shinokachimachi.

name: Gate Stay Premium Ginza Shintomicho
description: MONday Apart Premium 銀座新富町 is set in the Chuo Ward district of Tokyo, 300 metres from Shintomi Inari Shrine and 500 metres from The Birthplace of Joshiseigakuin. Complimentary WiFi is featured throughout the property and private parking is available on site. Accommodation is fitted with air conditioning, a fully equipped kitchen with a dining area, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with bidet, slippers and a hair dryer. A microwave, a toaster and fridge are also offered, as well as a kettle. Popular points of interest near the aparthotel include Gas Light in Chuo Monument, Futaba Gakuen Birthplace Monument and Aoyama Gakuin Memorial Land Monument. The nearest airport is Tokyo Haneda Airport, 16 km from MONday Apart Premium 銀座新富町.

name: Hotel Mystays Ueno Iriyaguchi
description: Offering spacious rooms with a kitchenette, free wired internet and a private bathroom, HOTEL MYSTAYS Ueno Iriyaguchi is just a 5-minute walk from JR Ueno Train Station. Free WiFi is availalbe in all areas, and a coin launderette is available on site. Refurbished in 2014, the rooms at HOTEL MYSTAYS Ueno Iriyaguchi offer contemporary comfort. Guests can make a meal with the hot plate and sink, or relax with a video-on-demand movie. An air purifier/humidifier is provided in each room. A private bathroom includes a hairdryer and free toiletries. Luggage can be left at the 24-hour front desk within reception hours (same-day only). You will find drinks vending machines. HOTEL MYSTAYS Ueno Iriyaguchi is only a 3-minute walk from Inaricho Subway Station, offering direct links to the Asakusa and Ginza areas. Ueno Park is a 10-minute walk away.

name: Sutton Place Hotel Ueno
description: Situated in Tokyo, 400 metres from Ryukoku-ji Temple, Sutton Place Hotel Ueno features views of the city. With free WiFi, this 3-star hotel offers a shared kitchen and a shared lounge. The property is 500 metres from Front gate of Honobo In Kanei-ji Temple, and within 6 km of the city centre. The hotel will provide guests with air-conditioned rooms offering a desk, a kettle, a fridge, a microwave, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with a bidet. At Sutton Place Hotel Ueno rooms include bed linen and towels. Popular points of interest near the accommodation include Kissho-in Temple, Gate of Former Residence of Koda Rohan and The Shitaya Shrine. The nearest airport is Tokyo Haneda Airport, 22 km from Sutton Place Hotel Ueno.

name: Monday Apart Premium Ueno Okachimachi
description: MONday Apart Premium UENO OKACHIMACHI features air-conditioned guest accommodation in the centre of Tokyo, 100 metres from Kamezumiinari Shrine, 400 metres from Akihabara Neribei Park and 400 metres from Convention Room AP Akihabara. Private parking is available on site. Featuring free WiFi, the units have a safety deposit box, a washing machine and a flat-screen TV with streaming services. There is a private bathroom with bidet in every unit, along with slippers, a hair dryer and free toiletries. Popular points of interest near the aparthotel include Fujisoft Akiba Plaza, Akihabara Convention Hall and Matsuzakaya Ueno. The nearest airport is Tokyo Haneda Airport, 21 km from MONday Apart Premium UENO OKACHIMACHI.

name: Tokyu Stay Aoyama Premier
description: Featuring stylish rooms with a kitchenette and city views, Tokyu Stay Aoyama Premier is a 2-minute walk from Gaienmae Subway Station. Guest can use the free Wi-Fi at the entire property and enjoy stores/restaurants located at the building's first 2 floors. Rooms are located between the 14th and 25th floors, and guests can relax with stunning views of central Tokyo. The air-conditioned rooms feature a flat-screen satellite TV, a safety deposit box and an in-room washer/dryer. The kitchenette comes with a microwave, a small fridge and an electric kettle. Kitchenware is also provided. The Omotesando area is a 10-minute walk away. Shibuya is just 2 subway stops from Gaienmae Station, and Ginza is a direct 15-minute trip in the other direction. Monte Azul on the 2nd floor of Passage Aoyama, located right below the hotel, offers a Western buffet breakfast between 07:00 and 10:00. Italian, Chinese and various other cuisines are offered at the Passage.

name: Toyoko Inn Tokyo Haneda Airport No.2
description: Ideally situated in the Ota Ward district of Tokyo, Toyoko Inn Tokyo Haneda Airport No.2 is situated 1.6 km from Uramori Inari Shrine, 1.9 km from Miwa Itsukushima Shrine and 2.1 km from Omori Hachiman Shrine. With free WiFi, this 3-star hotel offers free shuttle service and a 24-hour front desk. Gonsho-ji Temple is 2.6 km away and Tokujo-ji Temple is 3.2 km from the hotel. All units in the hotel are fitted with a flat-screen TV. All rooms at Toyoko Inn Tokyo Haneda Airport No.2 have air conditioning and a desk. American and Asian breakfast options are available each morning at the accommodation. Morigasaki Kotsu Park is 2.3 km from Toyoko Inn Tokyo Haneda Airport No.2, while Kifune Shrine is 2.5 km from the property. The nearest airport is Tokyo Haneda Airport, 2 km from the hotel.

name: Daimarubiru Guest House Sakae
address: 西新井栄町２－３－１１ ダイマルビル３f, Tokyo 123-0843
description: No description found

name: Citadines Shinjuku Tokyo
description: Set in Central Tokyo, the hotel is within a 10-minute walk of Tokyo Korean Culture Center. It also received TripAdvisor's Travelers' Choice Award - Top 25 Hotel in Japan 2013. This 3-star hotel offers free Wi-Fi, a concierge and a 24-hour reception. A fitness centre can be readily accessed by those wanting to keep active while away. All rooms are air conditioned and equipped with a refrigerator, a flat-screen TV and a microwave. They each include a seating area, a private bathroom and slippers. Citadines Shinjuku Tokyo is close to Shinjuku-sanchome Metro Station, making it easy for guests to discover Tokyo and its surrounding areas. Foodies will find many restaurants close by.Revato

name: The Tokyo Edition, Toranomon
description: Experience the unparalleled comfort of the luxury lifestyle at The Tokyo EDITION, Toranomon. With a downtown location offering a privileged view of Tokyo Tower and Tokyo Bay, our luxury hotel signals a new generation in laid-back luxury. Discover an unprecedented intersection of tasteful design, innovation and elevated service steps from the city’s renowned art galleries, cultural landmarks, nightlife and restaurants. Showcasing premier dining, entertainment and amenities under one roof, our enchanting hotel offers an oasis of sophistication in downtown Tokyo, Japan. Every amenity achieves the perfect balance of comfort and style, from a specialty restaurant and signature cocktail bar to a 24-hour gym and custom-designed spa with 6 treatment rooms. The Tokyo EDITION, Toranomon features 206 hotel rooms and suites with iconic skyline views, including 15 rooms with outdoor terraces.Marriott

name: Tokyu Stay Tsukiji
description: Located within a 5-minute walk from Higashi-Ginza and Tsukiji Subway Stations, Tokyu Stay Tukiji offers modern accommodation with free property-wide WiFi. It is situated right in the middle of Outer Tsukiji Fish Market, lined with many sushi restaurants and seafood vendors. Some rooms come with a kitchenette and a washing machine. The air-conditioned rooms are equipped with a flat-screen satellite TV, a small fridge and a electric kettle. A hairdryer and toiletries are included in the en suite bathroom. The front desk is open 24 hours, and the hotel has dry cleaning services. Fax, photocopying and courier services are also offered. Luggage can be stored at the property for free. Tokyu Stay Tukiji is a 10-minute walk from the Ginza area and a 3-minute walk from the Inner Tsukiji Fish Market with bustling wholesalers. The nearby subway stations offer easy access to the Akihabara, Ueno and Asakusa areas.

name: Bay Hotel Urayasu-ekimae
description: Bay Hotel Urayasu-ekimae features air-conditioned rooms with flat-screen TV in the Tokyo Disney Resort district of Urayasu. With free WiFi, this 3-star hotel offers a 24-hour front desk and luggage storage space. The property is non-smoking and is situated 700 metres from Former House of Udagawa Family. At the hotel, rooms have a balcony with a city view. The rooms will provide guests with a fridge. Former House of Otsuka Family is 700 metres from Bay Hotel Urayasu-ekimae, while Urayasu Local Museum is 1.6 km from the property. The nearest airport is Narita International Airport, 55 km from the accommodation.

name: Section L Yushima
description: Attractively located in the Bunkyo district of Tokyo, Section L Yushima is situated 600 metres from Kamezumiinari Shrine, 600 metres from Shitamachi Museum and 600 metres from Kyu-Iwasaki-tei Garden. The property is around 600 metres from ‪Marishiten Tokudaiji‬ Temple, less than 1 km from Kanda Shrine Stone Lion Statue and a 9-minute walk from Miyamoto Park. The property is 4.8 km from the city centre and 200 metres from Ryuseido Shinjo-in Temple. Guest rooms in the hotel are fitted with a kettle. Featuring a private bathroom with a shower and a hairdryer, rooms at Section L Yushima also boast free WiFi. All rooms will provide guests with air conditioning, a safety deposit box and a flat-screen TV. Speaking English and Japanese at the 24-hour front desk, staff will be happy to provide guests with practical advice on the area. Popular points of interest near the accommodation include Matsuzakaya Ueno, Yushima Goryo Shrine and Origami Kaikan. The nearest airport is Tokyo Haneda Airport, 21 km from Section L Yushima.

name: Hotel Arcsens
description: Located in Tokyo, 200 metres from Yokoamicho Park, Arcsens Tokyo provides rooms with air conditioning and free WiFi. Built in 2019, this 3-star hotel is within 300 metres of NTT Docomo History Square and 200 metres of Kanto Earthquake Memorial Museum. The property is non-smoking and is situated 200 metres from Tokyo Metropolitan Memorial Hall. At the hotel, each room comes with a desk, a flat-screen TV, a private bathroom, bed linen and towels. Guest rooms will provide guests with a fridge. Popular points of interest near Arcsens Tokyo include The Sumida Hokusai Museum, Japanese Sword Museum and Birthplace of Ukiyo-e Artist Hokusai Katsushika. The nearest airport is Tokyo Haneda Airport, 21 km from the accommodation.

name: Toyoko Inn Tokyo Nihombashi Ningyocho
description: Conveniently located in the Chuo Ward district of Tokyo, Toyoko Inn Tokyo Nihombashi Ningyocho is set 100 metres from Koamicho Children's Park, 300 metres from Monument of Armor Tribute Site and 500 metres from Sankatsu Yukata Museum. The 3-star hotel has air-conditioned rooms with a private bathroom and free WiFi. Private parking is available on site. At the hotel, all rooms have a desk. All guest rooms in Toyoko Inn Tokyo Nihombashi Ningyocho are fitted with a flat-screen TV and free toiletries. A continental breakfast is available every morning at the accommodation. Languages spoken at the 24-hour front desk include English and Japanese. Popular points of interest near Toyoko Inn Tokyo Nihombashi Ningyocho include Horidome Children's Park, Amazake Yokocho Shopping Street and Tokyo Shoken Building Inc. The nearest airport is Tokyo Haneda Airport, 19 km from the hotel.

name: Toyoko Inn Tokyo Tozai-sen Nishi-kasai
description: Attractively located in the Edogawa district of Tokyo, Toyoko Inn Tokyo Tozai-sen Nishi-kasai is situated 1.1 km from Shin Nagashima River Shinsui Park, 1.1 km from Gyosen Park and 1.2 km from Subway Museum. The 3-star hotel has air-conditioned rooms with a private bathroom and free WiFi. Private parking is available on site. At the hotel, rooms come with a desk. The rooms in Toyoko Inn Tokyo Tozai-sen Nishi-kasai are fitted with a flat-screen TV and free toiletries. A buffet breakfast is available each morning at the accommodation. Toyoko Inn Tokyo Tozai-sen Nishi-kasai can conveniently provide information at the reception to help guests to get around the area. Popular points of interest near the hotel include Ukita Park, Furukawa Shinsui Park and Shinsakon River Shinsui Park. The nearest airport is Tokyo Haneda Airport, 21 km from Toyoko Inn Tokyo Tozai-sen Nishi-kasai.

name: Section L Hatchobori
description: Along with laundry facilities, this smoke-free aparthotel has a 24-hour front desk and free WiFi in public areas. Each apartment provides a flat-screen TV with satellite channels, plus a kitchen with a refrigerator, a stovetop, and a microwave. Guests can appreciate conveniences like a washer/dryer and a dining area, and other amenities include free WiFi and a rice cooker. Housekeeping is available on request.Expedia

name: Section L Tsukiji
description: No description found

name: Fav Tokyo Nishinippori
description: Conveniently located in the Arakawa district of Tokyo, FAV TOKYO Nishinippori is situated 1.3 km from Nippori South Park, less than 1 km from Kyoouji Temple and a 11-minute walk from The Site of Koda Rohan House. With free WiFi, this 4-star hotel offers a shared lounge and a 24-hour front desk. The property is non-smoking and is set 1.1 km from Fabre Insect Museum. The hotel will provide guests with air-conditioned rooms with a desk, a kettle, a fridge, a microwave, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with a bidet. At FAV TOKYO Nishinippori all rooms have bed linen and towels. Guests at the accommodation can enjoy a continental breakfast. Popular points of interest near FAV TOKYO Nishinippori include Asakura Museum of Sculpture, Shinkomutsumi Shopping Street and TABATA Memorial Museum of Writers and Artists. The nearest airport is Tokyo Haneda Airport, 24 km from the hotel.

name: The Gate Hotel Tokyo by Hulic
description: Open from December 2018, an 11-minute walk from Marunouchi Building, The Gate Hotel Tokyo by Hulic is set in Tokyo and has a fitness centre and free WiFi. The property is located a 16-minute walk from Tsukiji Fish Market and 1.5 km from Japan Imperial Palace. The property is situated an 18-minute walk from National Diet Building and a 20-minute walk from Kachidoki Bridge. All guest rooms in the hotel are fitted with a flat-screen TV. Guest rooms include a wardrobe. A set menu of breakfast is served daily at the property. The Gate Hotel Tokyo by Hulic offers a terrace. Speaking English and Japanese at the reception, staff are ready to help around the clock. Tokyo Haneda International Airport is 13 km from the property.

name: Mr Kintaro Hotel Asakusa South
description: Located in Tokyo, this welcoming apartment brings it all within your reach. Your feet will make short work of the 8-minute walk to Kitchen Town or the 15-minute walk to Ameyoko Shopping District. Check out other neighborhoods and see more of Tokyo by hopping on a metro at either Shin-okachimachi Station, a short 7-minute walk away, or Kuramae Station (Oedo), 7 minutes away. The kitchenette is equipped with a stovetop and a refrigerator. Connect to the free WiFi, or get cozy in front of the flat-screen TV. And you can even travel light because you'll have access to laundry facilities.Expedia

name: Hyatt House Tokyo Shibuya
description: No description found

name: Mimaru Suites Tokyo Nihombashi
description: Set in the Chuo Ward district in Tokyo, MIMARU SUITES Tokyo NIHOMBASHI offers 4-star rooms with free WiFi. The property is around 400 metres from Revival Monument of Japanese Traditional Chinese Medicine, 700 metres from Koamicho Children's Park and 700 metres from Takarada Ebisu Shrine. The property is non-smoking and is situated 300 metres from Genyadana Monument. The hotel will provide guests with air-conditioned rooms with a wardrobe, a kettle, a fridge, a microwave, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with a bidet. At MIMARU SUITES Tokyo NIHOMBASHI all rooms include bed linen and towels. Popular points of interest near the accommodation include Sankatsu Yukata Museum, Suginomori Shrine and Amazake Yokocho Shopping Street. The nearest airport is Tokyo Haneda Airport, 19 km from MIMARU SUITES Tokyo NIHOMBASHI.

name: Hotel Villa Fontaine Premier Haneda Airport
description: Featuring a fitness centre, bar and views of river, Villa Fontaine Premier Haneda Airport is set in Tokyo and connected to Haneda Airport International Passenger Terminal. Among the facilities of this property are a 24-hour front desk and room service, along with free WiFi throughout the property. The accommodation offers a concierge service, luggage storage space and currency exchange for guests. The units come with air conditioning, a flat-screen TV with satellite channels, a fridge, a kettle, a bidet, a hairdryer and a desk. Every room includes a separate shower booth and views of the river. Villa Fontaine Premier Haneda Airpo offers a buffet or American breakfast. The accommodation offers an open-air hot spring bath, stone spa, sauna for guests to relax, while 30 restaurants are available onsite along with 60 shopping and shops. A business centre and vending machines with drinks are available on site at the accommodation.

name: Oakwood Premier Tokyo
description: Oakwood Premier Tokyo is a luxury serviced apartment with hotel-like services, located at just a 2-minute walk from JR Tokyo Station’s Yaesu North Exit. Located on the 6-19th floors of a 19-storey building, this property is designed to offer a getaway in the centre of Tokyo. There is a 24-hour front desk on site. All apartments are fully furnished and include a fully-equipped kitchen that has a refrigerator, microwave, oven, coffee machine and electric kettle. Kitchenware is also included. There is a flat-screen TV with cable and satellite channels in addition to a DVD player in the apartments. A washing machine and dryer are also provided for guests' convenience. Private bathrooms include a bathrobe, hairdryer and free toiletries. There is a fitness centre, residence lounge and meeting space at the property. The on-site concierge service offers restaurant and taxi reservation services in addition to photo copy and fax business services. Dry cleaning, ironing and laundry services are provided for an additional fee. There is a parking garage at this property. There are many restaurants, cafes and dining options within a 5-minute walking distance from Oakwood Premier Tokyo. There are convenience stores within a 3-minute walk from the property. Tokyo International Forum is a 12-minute walk while the popular Ginza shopping district is a 18-minute walk away from Tokyo Oakwood Premier. Both the Imperial Palace Gardens and Tsukiji Market are 21-minutes by train from Oakwood Premier Tokyo. Guests can access Haneda Airport and Narita International Airport by taking the Airport Limousine from the ground floor for 30-minutes and 60-minutes, respectively.

name: Toyoko Inn Tokyo Kamata No 1
description: In a prime location in the Ota Ward district of Tokyo, Toyoko Inn Tokyo Kamata No 1 is located 3.1 km from Omori Hachiman Shrine, 3.4 km from Miwa Itsukushima Shrine and 3.5 km from Uramori Inari Shrine. The 3-star hotel has air-conditioned rooms with a private bathroom and free WiFi. Gonsho-ji Temple is 3.9 km away and Morigasaki Kotsu Park is 4.1 km from the hotel. At the hotel, every room is fitted with a desk. All units in Toyoko Inn Tokyo Kamata No 1 are equipped with a flat-screen TV and free toiletries. A continental breakfast is available daily at the accommodation. Staff at Toyoko Inn Tokyo Kamata No 1 are available to provide guidance at the 24-hour front desk. Showa no Kurashi Museum is 3.6 km from the hotel, while Tokujo-ji Temple is 3.7 km away. The nearest airport is Tokyo Haneda Airport, 5 km from Toyoko Inn Tokyo Kamata No 1.

name: Tokyu Stay Nishi Shinjuku
description: Offering modern rooms with an in-room washer/dryer, microwave and a small fridge, Tokyu Stay Nishi Shinjuku is a 2-minute walk from Nishi-Shinjuku Gochome Subway Station. Some rooms feature a kitchenette, while free Wi-Fi is available at the entire property. The air-conditioned rooms at Tokyu Stay Nishi Shinjuku are equipped with a flat-screen satellite TV, a safety deposit box and an electric kettle. A hairdryer and free toiletries are provided. The hotel is a 5-minute walk from Shinjuku Central Park and a 15-minute stroll from JR Shinjuku Train Station. The Tokyo Metropolitan Government Building is a 10-minute walk away. The nearby subway station offers direct access to Shinjuku and Roppongi. Nishi Shinjuku Tokyu Stay offers luggage storage at the 24-hour front desk. Dry cleaning, photocopying and couriers services are available for an extra fee. Breakfast is served in your room. Please choose from Japanese or Western breakfast.

name: Toyoko Inn Tokyo Akabane-eki Higashi-guchi Ichiban-gai
description: Attractively set in the Kita district of Tokyo, Toyoko Inn Tokyo Akabane-eki Higashi-guchi Ichiban-gai is situated 200 metres from Daiman-ji Temple, 300 metres from Hodo-in Temple and 300 metres from Baio-ji Temple. The 3-star hotel has air-conditioned rooms with a private bathroom and free WiFi. Inatsuke Castle Ruins is less than 1 km away and Akabane Park is a 10-minute walk from the hotel. At the hotel, rooms are fitted with a desk. The rooms in Toyoko Inn Tokyo Akabane-eki Higashi-guchi Ichiban-gai are fitted with a flat-screen TV and free toiletries. A buffet breakfast is available each morning at the accommodation. Popular points of interest near Toyoko Inn Tokyo Akabane-eki Higashi-guchi Ichiban-gai include Shoko-ji Temple, Yakumo Shrine and Catholic Akabane Church. The nearest airport is Tokyo Haneda Airport, 33 km from the hotel.

name: Tokyu Stay Ginza
description: Tokyu Stay Ginza offers modern spacious guestrooms and free property-wide WiFi, and is conveniently located a 3-minute walk from Ginza Train Station's Exit A7. JR Tokyo Station and Tokyo International Forum are a 15-minute walk away while the Imperial Palace can be reached with a 14-minute drive from the property. All units are air conditioned and have a flat-screen TV with CNN channel, microwave and an electric kettle. Free amenities provided in the en suite bathroom include toothbrushes, shampoo and soap. Some units also have a kitchenette, equipped with a refrigerator. Free luggage storage is offered at the 24-hour front desk and trouser presses can be rented with no additional charge. The breakfast buffet served at the stylish on-site restaurant consists of a wide variety of Japanese and Western dishes. Kabukiza is just a 1-minute walk away from Ginza Tokyu Stay. Guests can also make a 3-minute walk to department stores like Mitsukoshi and Matsuya Ginza, or a 22-minute train ride to the lively Shinjuku area. Haneda Airport can be reached with a 24-minute ride on the Keikyu Line.

name: &Here Tokyo Ueno
description: Featuring 3-star accommodation, &Here Tokyo Ueno is located in Tokyo, 300 metres from Shitamachi Museum and 400 metres from Matsuzakaya Ueno. Featuring a spa and wellness centre, this 3-star hotel has air-conditioned rooms with a private bathroom. The property is 5.1 km from the city centre and 400 metres from Ryuseido Shinjo-in Temple. All units in the hotel are equipped with a flat-screen TV. At &Here Tokyo Ueno every room is equipped with bed linen and towels. Around the clock assistance is available at the reception, where staff speak English and Japanese. Popular points of interest near the accommodation include Kyu-Iwasaki-tei Garden, Yokoyama Taikan Memorial Hall and Saigo Takamori Statue. The nearest airport is Tokyo Haneda Airport, 22 km from &Here Tokyo Ueno.

name: Hotel Mystays Higashi Ikebukuro
description: Offering rooms with free WiFi and a kitchenette, Hotel MyStays Higashi-Ikebukuro is just a minute's walk from Mukohara Station and a 7 minute walk from JR Otsuka Train Station on the Yamanote Line. Guests at MyStays Higashi-Ikebukuro stay in modern air-conditioned rooms with a bathtub-equipped bathroom with a hairdryer, toothbrushes and free toiletries. Each room has a flat-screen TV with video-on-demand movies and an air purifier. The kitchenette includes a stovetop, microwave, sink and fridge. Guests can sleep using a memory foam pillow. The hotel provides coin-operated internet stations and laundry machines. Shinjuku and Shibuya are a 20-minute train ride away. Sunshine Building is a 5-minute walk away. Shin-Otsuka Subway Station is a 10-minute walk, and offers direct access to Tokyo Dome.

name: Hotel Mystays Nippori
description: Hotel MyStays Nippori is a 5-minute walk from JR Nippori Train Station and a 15-minute ride from the Ameyoko Arcade. It offers modern guestrooms with a kitchenette and a private bathroom. Free WiFi access is available throughout the entire property. Guestrooms offer both air conditioning and heating facilities. Each room is fitted with a microwave and a fridge. The en suite bathroom features a bathtub and shower. Free toiletries, slippers and a hairdryer are provided. Ironing equipment and kitchenware can be borrowed from the front desk. The hotel provides coin-operated laundry machines. Fax and photocopying services are offered. The shared lounge provides cup noodles and drink vending machines. Portable WiFi routers can be borrowed from the front desk, at an additional charge. MyStays Nippori is a 15-minute walk from Ueno Park and a 45-minute ride from Tokyo Disneyland. The nearby Nippori Station offers direct access to Narita Airport in 36-minutes via the Keisei Skyliner. Haneda International Airport is 35-minutes away via train.

name: Keisei Richmond Hotel Tokyo Monzennakacho
description: In a prime location in the Koto Ward district of Tokyo, Keisei Richmond Hotel Tokyo Monzennakacho is situated 400 metres from Fukagawa Park, 400 metres from Botancho Park and 500 metres from Ozeki Stone Tomioka Hachiman Monument. Among the facilities of this property are a restaurant, a 24-hour front desk and a shared lounge, along with free WiFi throughout the property. The property is allergy-free and is set 300 metres from Furuishibagawa Shinsui Park. The units come with air conditioning, a microwave, a fridge, a kettle, a hot tub, a hairdryer and a wardrobe. Featuring a private bathroom with a bidet and free toiletries, rooms at the hotel also provide guests with a city view. Guests at Keisei Richmond Hotel Tokyo Monzenn can enjoy a buffet breakfast. Popular points of interest near the accommodation include Tomioka Hachimangu Temple, Old Nitta Bridge and Ino Tadataka House Ruins. The nearest airport is Tokyo Haneda International Airport, 25 km from Keisei Richmond Hotel Tokyo Monzennakacho.

name: Sotetsu Grand Fresa Tokyo - Bay Ariake
description: Sotetsu Grand Fresa Tokyo-Bay Ariake offers comfortable individually decorated rooms with free WiFi and spectacular night views of the bay area. It houses a convenience store, a restaurant and a cafe. Sotetsu Grand Fresa Tokyo-Bay Ariake is just a 3-minute walk from Kokusai Tenjjijo Station, and a 5-minute walk from exhibition centre Tokyo Big Sight. Panasonic Centre Tokyo is 700 metres away. Rooms are air-conditioned and furnished with a flat-screen TV and extra long beds. A fridge and an electric kettle are provided, and the spacious bathroom offers a selection of toiletries. Some rooms have an air purifier/humidifier and a foot massage machine. Guests can find daily necessities in the convenience store, and enjoy massage service in their room. Sotetsu Grand Fresa Tokyo-Bay Ariake offers shuttle services to and from Tokyo Disneyland/Sea for free. Restaurant Sosai Patio boasts contemporary local cuisine and international dishes with a touch of local flavour.

name: Tokyu Stay Meguro Yutenji
description: A 3-minute walk from Yutenji Station, Tokyu Stay Meguro Yutenji lies in a quiet area. Some room feature a kitchenette and a washing machine. The hotel offers free Wi-Fi at the entire property. The air-conditioned rooms feature a flat-screen satellite TV, a private washing machine and a safety deposit box. The kitchenette comes with a microwave, a fridge and an electric kettle. Kitchenware is also provided and the en suite bathroom comes with a hairdryer and toiletries. Nightwear and slippers are offered for all guests. The Tokyu Stay Meguro Yutenji has a 24-hour front desk, which offers free luggage storage. The hotel provides dry cleaning, photocopying and courier services at extra charges. Drink vending machines are available. From Yutenji Station it takes 11 minutes by train to Roppongi area and Shinjuku is a 20-minute train ride away.

name: Hundred Stay Tokyo Shinjuku
description: Hundred Stay Shinjuku provides modern service apartments with flat-screen TVs and free WiFi. Featuring a fitness room and cafe, it is a 3-minute walk to JR Okubo Train Station. One- and two-bedroom apartments at Hundred Stay Tokyo Shinjuku come with a fully equipped kitchen, living room and washing machine. All rooms include a microwave, fridge and en suite bathroom. Guests can watch a DVD or relax in the bathtub. From nearby Okubo Station, Shinjuku Station is 1 train stop away, and Tokyo Station is a 25-minute ride. Shin-Okubo Korea Town is 500 metres away. The lively Kabukicho area is a 15-minute walk. The hotel features free internet access. Laundry services are available and a concierge is on call 24/7.

name: Dormy Inn Akihabara Hot Spring
description: Renovated in July 2015, Dormy Inn offers rooms with free internet, good transportation links and an open-air bath with sauna. The property is just a 5-minute walk from Akihabara Electric Town. Dormy Inn's air-conditioned rooms have a flat-screen TV, hairdryer and private shower room. Dormy Inn Akihabara's facilities include a restaurant, free internet access in the lobby and coin-operated laundry machines with free detergent. Tumble dryers are available at a fee. There are separate open-air baths for men and women available at the property. Breakfast is available at the on-site restaurant. Free Yonaki Soba ramen noodles are catered at night. It is less that a 5-minute walk from JR Akihabara Station and Suehirocho Station for the Tokyo Metro Ginza Line.

name: Nohga Hotel Ueno Tokyo
description: Situated in Tokyo, 400 metres from The Shitaya Shrine, NOHGA HOTEL UENO TOKYO features accommodation with a fitness centre, private parking, a shared lounge and a terrace. Among the facilities of this property are a restaurant, a 24-hour front desk and a concierge service, along with free WiFi throughout the property. The property is 600 metres from Choen-ji Temple, and within 5.7 km of the city centre. Selected rooms also boast a kitchenette with a fridge, a microwave and a toaster. A continental breakfast is available each morning at the hotel. Popular points of interest near NOHGA HOTEL UENO TOKYO include Ryukoku-ji Temple, Shitamachi Museum and Saigo Takamori Statue. The nearest airport is Tokyo Haneda Airport, 21 km from the accommodation.
